label: Leads-When intro does not attend the intro class

values.Template Name: When intro does not attend the intro class
values.SMS Content:
Hi member('First Name')! 
Sorry we missed you for your intro class! Please reply to this text to let us know when the best
time is to reschedule. We look forward to seeing you on the mats. 
Kind Regards, 
${submitterName}

Hi member('First Name'),  
I just wanted to send you a reminder that ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} was unable to process your last payment. 
Please contact the school to update your information.
Kind Regards,
${submitterName}

I'm just following up about your last payment. We weren't able to process your
membership payment. This could be due to many different reasons. 
Please contact the school to update your information.

Kind Regards,
${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Hi member('First Name'), 
We need your assistance.
For the past week, we have been trying to contact in order to update your financial information for your
membership. 
Please contact the school so we can get your account up to date.
Kind Regards,
${submitterName}

Hey member('First Name')!
Congratulations! You're officially booked in for your intro class at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} on ${Intro Scheduled Date}! ğŸ¥‹
Get ready for an incredible experience! We'll have a uniform ready for you, so just show up 15 minutes early to get changed and meet our awesome instructors. Don't forget to bring along some water to stay hydrated and slip-on shoes for convenience. We're thrilled to welcome you to our family! Please confirm your booking by replying with a 'Y' for yes or 'N' for no. Here's where to find us: ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}. Get ready to embark on this exciting journey with us. Looking forward to meeting you! 
Warm regards,
${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Add Mens information here..

https://${space}.gbmembers.net/#/kapps/services/forms/mens-registration?public&id=member('ID')

Hi member('First Name')! We've noticed you've been as scarce as a gi in a no-gi class lately! ğŸ¥‹ Don't worry, we won't put you in an armbar for missing. Let's get you back on the mats and rolling again!

label: Leads-When intro does not attend the intro class

values.Template Name: When intro does not attend the intro class

values.SMS Content:
Hi member('First Name')! 
Thank you for your interest in Gracie Barra Brazilian Jiu Jitsu. 
Please call us back as soon as you can to schedule your intro class at no cost to you. 
${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

Hi member('First Name'),  
We just wanted to notify you that ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} was unable to process your last payment. 
This could be for lost card, expired card, etc.  Please contact the school at ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')} to update your information.  Thank you.
Kind Regards,
${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

Hi member('First Name')! 
Thank you for your interest in ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Brazilian Jiu Jitsu.  We would love to organize a date for your free intro class! It would be a great opportunity for you to check out our facility, meet our instructors and make sure it is a good fit :) If you prefer to communicate through texting or phone call reply to this text with your preference and we will reach out shortly. Looking forward to hearing from you! :)

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}
${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team
